ne36:1.2_0: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya ca bhavataṇhāya ca, tattha avijjānīvaraṇaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanaṁ.
ne36:1.3_0: Avijjānīvaraṇā sattā avijjāsaṁyuttā avijjāpakkhena vicaranti, te vuccanti diṭṭhicaritāti.
ne36:1.4_0: Taṇhāsaṁyojanā sattā taṇhāsaṁyuttā taṇhāpakkhena vicaranti, te vuccanti taṇhācaritāti.
ne36:1.5_0: Diṭṭhicaritā ito bahiddhā pabbajitā attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti.
ne36:1.6_0: Taṇhācaritā ito bahiddhā pabbajitā kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti.
ne36:2.1_0: Tattha kiṅkāraṇaṁ yaṁ diṭṭhicaritā ito bahiddhā pabbajitā attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti,
ne36:2.1_1: taṇhācaritā ito bahiddhā pabbajitā kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti?
ne36:2.2_1: kuto catusaccappakāsanā vā samathavipassanākosallaṁ vā upasamasukhappatti vā.
ne36:2.3_0: Te upasamasukhassa anabhiññā viparītacetā evamāhaṁsu “natthi sukhena sukhaṁ,
ne36:2.4_3: so bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavatīti te evaṁsaññī evaṁdiṭṭhī dukkhena sukhaṁ patthayamānā kāmesu puññasaññī attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttā
ne36:2.4_8: te rogābhitunnā gaṇḍapaṭipīḷitā sallānuviddhā nirayatiracchānayonipetāsuresu ummujjanimujjāni karontā
ne36:2.5_0: Tattha attakilamathānuyogo kāmasukhallikānuyogo ca saṅkileso, samathavipassanā vodānaṁ.
ne36:2.6_0: Attakilamathānuyogo kāmasukhallikānuyogo ca rogo, samathavipassanā roganigghātakabhesajjaṁ.
ne36:2.7_0: Attakilamathānuyogo kāmasukhallikānuyogo ca gaṇḍo, samathavipassanā gaṇḍanigghātakabhesajjaṁ.
ne36:2.8_0: Attakilamathānuyogo kāmasukhallikānuyogo ca sallo, samathavipassanā salluddharaṇabhesajjaṁ.
ne36:3.2_0: Dukkhaṁ pariññeyyaṁ, samudayo pahātabbo, maggo bhāvetabbo, nirodho sacchikātabbo.
ne36:4.7_0: Attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ,
ne36:5.1_1: anvāyikā sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi,
ne36:5.2_0: Te tayo khandhā sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho paññākkhandho.
ne36:5.3_0: Sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho ca samatho, paññākkhandho vipassanā.
ne36:5.5_0: Dukkhaṁ pariññeyyaṁ, samudayo pahātabbo, maggo bhāvetabbo, nirodho sacchikātabbo.
ne36:6.8_0: Attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
ne36:6.12_0: ye viññāṇavantaṁ attānaṁ upagacchanti, attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
ne36:6.13_0: Ime vuccanti “sassatavādino”ti, tattha ucchedasassatavādā ubho antā, ayaṁ saṁsārapavatti.
ne36:6.14_0: Tassa paṭipakkho majjhimā paṭipadā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, ayaṁ saṁsāranivatti.
ne36:6.16_0: Dukkhaṁ pariññeyyaṁ, samudayo pahātabbo, maggo bhāvetabbo, nirodho sacchikātabbo.
ne36:7.1_2: tesaṁ paṭipakkho tecattālīsaṁ bodhipakkhiyā dhammā aṭṭha vimokkhā dasa kasiṇāyatanāni.
ne36:7.4_2: tena vuccati “pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya ca bhavataṇhāya cā”ti.
ne36:8.1_0: Tattha diṭṭhicarito asmiṁ sāsane pabbajito sallekhānusantatavutti bhavati sallekhe tibbagāravo.
ne36:8.2_0: Taṇhācarito asmiṁ sāsane pabbajito sikkhānusantatavutti bhavati sikkhāya tibbagāravo.
ne36:8.4_1: diṭṭhicarito sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya khippābhiññāya ca niyyāti.
ne36:8.5_0: Taṇhācarito dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya khippābhiññāya ca niyyāti.
ne36:9.1_1: yaṁ taṇhācarito dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya khippābhiññāya ca niyyāti,
ne36:9.1_3: so kāmehi viveciyamāno dukkhena paṭinissarati dandhañca dhammaṁ ājānāti?
ne36:9.2_0: Yo panāyaṁ diṭṭhicarito ayaṁ āditoyeva kāmehi anatthiko bhavati.
ne36:9.3_0: So tato viveciyamāno khippañca paṭinissarati, khippañca dhammaṁ ājānāti.
ne36:9.4_0: Dukkhāpi paṭipadā duvidhā dandhābhiññā ca khippābhiññā ca.
ne36:9.5_0: Sukhāpi paṭipadā duvidhā dandhābhiññā ca khippābhiññā ca.
ne36:9.7_0: Ye mudindriyā, te dandhañca paṭinissaranti dandhañca dhammaṁ ājānanti.
ne36:9.8_0: Ye tikkhindriyā, te khippañca paṭinissaranti, khippañca dhammaṁ ājānanti, imā catasso paṭipadā.
ne36:9.9_0: Ye hi keci niyyiṁsu vā niyyanti vā niyyissanti vā, te imāhi eva catūhi paṭipadāhi.
ne36:9.10_0: Evaṁ ariyā catukkamaggaṁ paññāpenti abudhajanasevitāya bālakantāya rattavāsiniyā nandiyā bhavataṇhāya avaṭṭanatthaṁ.
ne36:9.11_0: Ayaṁ vuccati nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmīti, tenāha “taṇhañca avijjampi ca samathenā”ti.
ne36:10.1_0: Veyyākaraṇesu hi ye kusalākusalāti te duvidhā upaparikkhitabbā—
ne36:10.8_0: Upacayena sabbepi kilesā catūhi vipallāsehi niddisitabbā.
ne36:11.1_0: Tattha yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro phasso āhāro, ime taṇhācaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā.
ne36:11.2_0: Yo ca manosañcetanāhāro yo ca viññāṇāhāro, ime diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā.
ne36:11.5_0: Tattha yañca kāmupādānaṁ yañca bhavupādānaṁ, ime taṇhācaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā.
ne36:11.6_0: Yañca diṭṭhupādānaṁ yañca attavādupādānaṁ, ime diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā.
ne36:11.7_0: Tattha yo ca kāmayogo, yo ca bhavayogo, ime taṇhācaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā.
ne36:11.8_0: Yo ca diṭṭhiyogo, yo ca avijjāyogo, ime diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā.
ne36:11.9_0: Tattha yo ca abhijjhākāyagantho, yo ca byāpādo kāyagantho, ime taṇhācaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā.
ne36:11.11_0: Tattha yo ca kāmāsavo, yo ca bhavāsavo, ime taṇhācaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā.
ne36:11.12_0: Yo ca diṭṭhāsavo, yo ca avijjāsavo, ime diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā.
ne36:11.13_0: Tattha yo ca kāmogho, yo ca bhavogho, ime taṇhācaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā.
ne36:11.14_0: Yo ca diṭṭhogho, yo ca avijjogho, ime diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā.
ne36:11.15_0: Tattha yo ca rāgasallo, yo ca dosasallo, ime taṇhācaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā.
ne36:11.16_0: Yo ca mānasallo, yo ca mohasallo, ime diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā.
ne36:11.19_0: Tattha yañca chandā agatigamanaṁ yañca dosā agatigamanaṁ, ime taṇhācaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā.
ne36:11.20_0: Yañca bhayā agatigamanaṁ, yañca mohā agatigamanaṁ, ime diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā.
ne36:12.2_0: Paṭhame vipallāse ṭhito kāme upādiyati, idaṁ vuccati kāmupādānaṁ;
ne36:12.3_0: dutiye vipallāse ṭhito anāgataṁ bhavaṁ upādiyati, idaṁ vuccati bhavupādānaṁ;
ne36:12.4_0: tatiye vipallāse ṭhito saṁsārābhinandiniṁ diṭṭhiṁ upādiyati, idaṁ vuccati diṭṭhupādānaṁ;
ne36:12.5_0: catutthe vipallāse ṭhito attānaṁ kappiyaṁ upādiyati, idaṁ vuccati attavādupādānaṁ.
ne36:13.1_0: Kāmupādānena kāmehi saṁyujjati, ayaṁ vuccati kāmayogo;
ne36:13.2_0: bhavupādānena bhavehi saṁyujjati, ayaṁ vuccati bhavayogo;
ne36:13.3_0: diṭṭhupādānena pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā saṁyujjati, ayaṁ vuccati diṭṭhiyogo;
ne36:13.4_0: attavādupādānena avijjāya saṁyujjati, ayaṁ vuccati avijjāyogo.
ne36:14.1_0: Paṭhame yoge ṭhito abhijjhāya kāyaṁ ganthati, ayaṁ vuccati abhijjhākāyagantho;
ne36:14.2_0: dutiye yoge ṭhito byāpādena kāyaṁ ganthati, ayaṁ vuccati byāpādakāyagantho;
ne36:14.3_0: tatiye yoge ṭhito parāmāsena kāyaṁ ganthati, ayaṁ vuccati parāmāsakāyagantho;
ne36:14.4_0: catutthe yoge ṭhito idaṁsaccābhinivesena kāyaṁ ganthati, ayaṁ vuccati idaṁsaccābhinivesakāyagantho.
ne36:16.1_0: Tassa ime cattāro āsavā vepullaṁ gatā oghā bhavanti.
ne36:16.3_0: Tattha kāmāsavena kāmogho, bhavāsavena bhavogho, diṭṭhāsavena diṭṭhogho, avijjāsavena avijjogho.
ne36:17.1_0: Tassa ime cattāro oghā anusayasahagatā ajjhāsayaṁ anupaviṭṭhā hadayaṁ āhacca tiṭṭhanti,
ne36:17.2_0: Tattha kāmoghena rāgasallo, bhavoghena dosasallo, diṭṭhoghena mānasallo, avijjoghena mohasallo.
ne36:18.1_0: Tassa imehi catūhi sallehi pariyādinnaṁ viññāṇaṁ catūsu dhammesu saṇṭhahati rūpe vedanāya saññāya saṅkhāresu.
ne36:18.2_0: Tattha rāgasallena nandūpasecanena viññāṇena rūpūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti,
ne36:19.1_0: Tassa imāhi catūhi viññāṇaṭṭhitīhi upatthaddhaṁ viññāṇaṁ catūhi dhammehi agatiṁ gacchati chandā dosā bhayā mohā.
ne36:19.3_0: Iti kho tañca kammaṁ ime ca kilesā,
ne36:19.3_2: evaṁ sabbe kilesā catūhi vipallāsehi niddisitabbā.
ne36:20.1_0: Tattha imā catasso disā kabaḷīkāro āhāro “asubhe subhan”ti vipallāso,
ne36:24.1_0: Tattha yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro yo ca “asubhe subhan”ti vipallāso,
ne36:25.1_0: Tattha yo ca phasso āhāro yo ca “dukkhe sukhan”ti vipallāso,
ne36:25.1_7: dosā agatigamananti imesaṁ dasannaṁ suttānaṁ eko attho byañjanameva nānaṁ,
ne36:26.1_0: Tattha yo ca viññāṇāhāro yo ca “anicce niccan”ti vipallāso,
ne36:26.1_8: bhayā agatigamananti imesaṁ dasannaṁ suttānaṁ eko attho,
ne36:27.1_0: Tattha yo ca manosañcetanāhāro yo ca “anattani attā”ti vipallāso,
ne36:28.1_0: Tattha yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro yo ca phasso āhāro,
ne36:28.1_6: ime appaṇihitena vimokkhamukhena pahānaṁ abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
ne36:28.2_0: “Anicce niccan”ti vipallāso suññatāya, “anattani attā”ti vipallāso animittena.
ne36:28.3_0: Tattha kāmupādānañca bhavupādānañca appaṇihitena vimokkhamukhena pahānaṁ gacchanti.
ne36:28.5_0: Tattha kāmayogo ca bhavayogo ca appaṇihitena vimokkhamukhena pahānaṁ gacchanti,
ne36:28.6_0: Tattha abhijjhākāyagantho ca byāpādakāyagantho ca appaṇihitena vimokkhamukhena pahānaṁ gacchanti,
ne36:29.1_0: Tattha kāmāsavo ca bhavāsavo ca appaṇihitena vimokkhamukhena pahānaṁ gacchanti,
ne36:29.2_0: Tattha kāmogho ca bhavogho ca appaṇihitena vimokkhamukhena pahānaṁ gacchanti,
ne36:29.3_0: Tattha rāgasallo ca dosasallo ca appaṇihitena vimokkhamukhena pahānaṁ gacchanti,
ne36:29.4_0: Tattha rūpūpagā ca viññāṇaṭṭhiti vedanūpagā ca viññāṇaṭṭhiti appaṇihitena vimokkhamukhena pariññaṁ gacchanti,
ne36:30.1_0: Tattha chandā ca agatigamanaṁ dosā ca agatigamanaṁ appaṇihitena vimokkhamukhena pahānaṁ gacchanti,
ne36:30.1_2: mohā agatigamanaṁ animittena vimokkhamukhena pahānaṁ gacchanti.
ne36:33.5_0: Paṭhamaṁ sammappadhānaṁ paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo,
ne36:33.5_3: catutthaṁ sammappadhānaṁ catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
ne36:33.6_0: Paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo paṭhamaṁ adhiṭṭhānaṁ,
ne36:33.6_1: dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo dutiyaṁ adhiṭṭhānaṁ,
ne36:33.6_2: tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo tatiyaṁ adhiṭṭhānaṁ,
ne36:33.6_3: catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo catutthaṁ adhiṭṭhānaṁ.
ne36:33.10_0: Paṭhamā paṭipadā bhāvitā bahulīkatā paṭhamaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ paripūreti,
ne36:33.10_1: dutiyā paṭipadā bhāvitā bahulīkatā dutiyaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ paripūreti,
ne36:33.10_2: tatiyā paṭipadā bhāvitā bahulīkatā tatiyaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ paripūreti,
ne36:33.10_3: catutthī paṭipadā bhāvitā bahulīkatā catutthaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ paripūreti.
ne36:33.11_0: Paṭhamo satipaṭṭhāno bhāvito bahulīkato paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ paripūreti,
ne36:33.11_1: dutiyo satipaṭṭhāno bhāvito bahulīkato dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ paripūreti,
ne36:33.11_2: tatiyo satipaṭṭhāno bhāvito bahulīkato tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ paripūreti,
ne36:33.11_3: catuttho satipaṭṭhāno bhāvito bahulīkato catutthaṁ jhānaṁ paripūreti.
ne36:34.1_0: Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ bhāvitaṁ bahulīkataṁ paṭhamaṁ vihāraṁ paripūreti,
ne36:34.1_1: dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ bhāvitaṁ bahulīkataṁ dutiyaṁ vihāraṁ paripūreti,
ne36:34.1_2: tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ bhāvitaṁ bahulīkataṁ tatiyaṁ vihāraṁ paripūreti,
ne36:34.1_3: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ bhāvitaṁ bahulīkataṁ catutthaṁ vihāraṁ paripūreti.
ne36:34.2_0: Paṭhamo vihāro bhāvito bahulīkato anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādaṁ paripūreti,
ne36:34.2_1: dutiyo vihāro bhāvito bahulīkato uppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānaṁ paripūreti,
ne36:34.2_2: tatiyo vihāro bhāvito bahulīkato anuppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādaṁ paripūreti,
ne36:34.2_3: catuttho vihāro bhāvito bahulīkato uppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ṭhitiṁ asammosaṁ bhiyyobhāvaṁ paripūreti.
ne36:34.3_0: Paṭhamaṁ sammappadhānaṁ bhāvitaṁ bahulīkataṁ mānappahānaṁ paripūreti,
ne36:34.3_1: dutiyaṁ sammappadhānaṁ bhāvitaṁ bahulīkataṁ ālayasamugghātaṁ paripūreti,
ne36:34.3_2: tatiyaṁ sammappadhānaṁ bhāvitaṁ bahulīkataṁ avijjāpahānaṁ paripūreti,
ne36:34.3_3: catutthaṁ sammappadhānaṁ bhāvitaṁ bahulīkataṁ bhavūpasamaṁ paripūreti.
ne36:35.1_0: Tattha imā catasso disā paṭhamā paṭipadā paṭhamo satipaṭṭhāno paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ paṭhamo vihāro paṭhamo
ne36:35.1_1: sammappadhāno paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saccādhiṭṭhānaṁ chandasamādhi indriyasaṁvaro mettā iti
ne36:36.1_0: Dutiyā paṭipadā dutiyo satipaṭṭhāno dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ dutiyo vihāro dutiyo sammappadhāno dutiyo acchariyo
ne36:36.1_1: abbhuto dhammo bhavādhiṭṭhānaṁ vīriyasamādhi tapo karuṇā iti dutiyā disā.
ne36:37.1_0: Tatiyā paṭipadā tatiyo satipaṭṭhāno tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ tatiyo vihāro tatiyo sammappadhāno tatiyo acchariyo
ne36:37.1_1: abbhuto dhammo paññādhiṭṭhānaṁ cittasamādhi buddhi muditā iti tatiyā disā.
ne36:38.1_0: Catutthī paṭipadā catuttho satipaṭṭhāno catutthaṁ jhānaṁ catuttho vihāro catuttho sammappadhāno catuttho
ne36:38.1_1: acchariyo abbhuto dhammo upasamādhiṭṭhānaṁ vīmaṁsāsamādhi sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo upekkhā iti catutthī disā.
ne36:39.1_0: Tattha paṭhamā paṭipadā paṭhamo satipaṭṭhāno paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ paṭhamo vihāro paṭhamo sammappadhāno paṭhamo
ne36:39.1_1: acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saccādhiṭṭhānaṁ chandasamādhi indriyasaṁvaro,
ne36:39.1_2: mettā iti imesaṁ dasannaṁ suttānaṁ eko attho,
ne36:40.1_0: Dutiyā paṭipadā dutiyo satipaṭṭhāno dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ dutiyo vihāro dutiyo sammappadhāno dutiyo acchariyo
ne36:40.1_1: abbhuto dhammo cāgādhiṭṭhānaṁ vīriyasamādhi tapo karuṇā iti imesaṁ dasannaṁ suttānaṁ eko attho,
ne36:41.1_0: Tatiyā paṭipadā tatiyo satipaṭṭhāno tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ tatiyo vihāro tatiyo sammappadhāno tatiyo acchariyo
ne36:41.1_1: abbhuto dhammo paññādhiṭṭhānaṁ cittasamādhi buddhi muditā iti imesaṁ dasannaṁ suttānaṁ eko attho,
ne36:42.1_0: Catutthī paṭipadā catuttho satipaṭṭhāno catutthaṁ jhānaṁ catuttho vihāro catuttho sammappadhāno catuttho
ne36:42.1_1: acchariyo abbhuto dhammo upasamādhiṭṭhānaṁ vīmaṁsāsamādhi sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo upekkhā iti imesaṁ dasannaṁ
ne36:43.1_0: Tattha dukkhā ca paṭipadā dandhābhiññā dukkhā ca paṭipadā khippābhiññā appaṇihitaṁ vimokkhamukhaṁ,
ne36:44.1_0: Tattha kāye kāyānupassitā satipaṭṭhānañca vedanāsu vedanānupassitā satipaṭṭhānañca appaṇihitaṁ vimokkhamukhaṁ,
ne36:45.1_0: Tattha paṭhamañca jhānaṁ dutiyañca jhānaṁ appaṇihitaṁ vimokkhamukhaṁ,
ne36:46.1_0: Tattha paṭhamo ca vihāro dutiyo ca vihāro appaṇihitaṁ vimokkhamukhaṁ,
ne36:47.1_0: Yattha paṭhamañca sammappadhānaṁ dutiyañca sammappadhānaṁ appaṇihitaṁ vimokkhamukhaṁ,
ne36:48.1_0: Tattha mānappahānañca ālayasamugghāto ca appaṇihitaṁ vimokkhamukhaṁ,
ne36:50.1_0: Tattha chandasamādhi ca vīriyasamādhi ca appaṇihitaṁ vimokkhamukhaṁ,
ne36:51.1_0: Tattha indriyasaṁvaro ca tapo ca appaṇihitaṁ vimokkhamukhaṁ,
ne36:51.1_1: buddhi suññataṁ vimokkhamukhaṁ sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo animittaṁ vimokkhamukhaṁ.
ne36:52.1_0: Tattha mettā ca karuṇā ca appaṇihitaṁ vimokkhamukhaṁ,
ne36:52.1_1: muditā suññataṁ vimokkhamukhaṁ upekkhā animittaṁ vimokkhamukhaṁ.
ne36:53.2_0: Cattāro āhārā tesaṁ paṭipakkho catasso paṭipadā …pe…
ne36:53.3_0: cattāro vipallāsā tesaṁ paṭipakkho cattāro satipaṭṭhānā.
ne36:53.4_0: Cattāri upādānāni tesaṁ paṭipakkho cattāri jhānāni.
ne36:53.5_0: Cattāro yogā tesaṁ paṭipakkho cattāro vihārā.
ne36:53.6_0: Cattāro ganthā tesaṁ paṭipakkho cattāro sammappadhānā.
ne36:53.7_0: Cattāro āsavā tesaṁ paṭipakkho cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā.
ne36:53.8_0: Cattāro oghā tesaṁ paṭipakkho cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni.
ne36:53.9_0: Cattāro sallā tesaṁ paṭipakkho catasso samādhibhāvanā.
ne36:53.10_0: Catasso viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo tāsaṁ paṭipakkho cattāro sukhabhāgiyā dhammā.
ne36:53.11_0: Cattāri agatigamanāni tesaṁ paṭipakkho catasso appamāṇā.
ne36:54.1_0: Sīhā buddhā paccekabuddhā sāvakā ca hatarāgadosamohā,
ne36:54.1_1: tesaṁ vikkīḷitaṁ bhāvanā sacchikiriyā byantīkiriyā ca.
ne36:54.4_0: Ayaṁ vuccati sīhavikkīḷitassa ca nayassa disālocanassa ca nayassa bhūmīti.
ne36:55.1_0: Tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya khippābhiññāya ca niyyanti, ime dve puggalā;
ne36:55.2_0: ye sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya khippābhiññāya ca niyyanti, ime dve puggalā.
ne36:56.1_0: Tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya khippābhiññāya ca niyyanti ime dve puggalā.
ne36:56.2_0: Ye sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya khippābhiññāya ca niyyanti, ime dve puggalā.
ne36:56.3_0: Tattha yo sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyāti, ayaṁ ugghaṭitaññū.
ne36:56.5_0: Yo dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyāti, ayaṁ neyyo.
ne36:57.1_0: Tattha bhagavā ugghaṭitaññussa puggalassa samathaṁ upadisati,
ne36:57.2_0: Tattha bhagavā ugghaṭitaññussa puggalassa mudukaṁ dhammadesanaṁ upadisati,
ne36:57.2_3: tattha bhagavā ugghaṭitaññussa puggalassa saṅkhittena dhammaṁ desayati,
ne36:57.3_0: Tattha bhagavā ugghaṭitaññussa puggalassa nissaraṇaṁ upadisati,
ne36:58.1_0: Tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya khippābhiññāya ca niyyanti, ime dve puggalā.
ne36:58.2_0: Ye sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya khippābhiññāya ca niyyanti.
ne36:58.4_0: Iti kho cattāri hutvā tīṇi bhavanti ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyoti.
ne36:59.1_1: tīṇi akusalamūlāni lobho akusalamūlaṁ doso akusalamūlaṁ moho akusalamūlaṁ,
ne36:59.10_0: sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā adukkhamasukhā vedanā;
ne36:59.20_0: akusalaṁ kāyakammaṁ akusalaṁ vacīkammaṁ akusalaṁ manokammaṁ.
ne36:59.25_0: alobho kusalamūlaṁ adoso kusalamūlaṁ amoho kusalamūlaṁ.
ne36:59.31_0: savitakko savicāro samādhi avitakko vicāramatto samādhi avitakko avicāro samādhi.
ne36:59.37_0: kusalaṁ kāyakammaṁ kusalaṁ vacīkammaṁ kusalaṁ manokammaṁ.
ne36:60.1_0: Iti kho cattāri hutvā tīṇi bhavanti, tīṇi hutvā dve bhavanti taṇhācarito ca diṭṭhicarito ca.
ne36:61.1_1: taṇhā ca avijjā ca ahirikañca anottappañca assati ca asampajaññañca ayoniso manasikāro ca kosajjañca
ne36:61.1_2: dovacassañca ahaṅkāro ca mamaṅkāro ca assaddhā ca pamādo ca asaddhammassavanañca asaṁvaro ca abhijjhā
ne36:61.1_3: ca byāpādo ca nīvaraṇañca saṁyojanañca kodho ca upanāho ca makkho ca palāso ca issā ca maccherañca māyā
ne36:61.1_4: ca sāṭheyyañca sassatadiṭṭhi ca ucchedadiṭṭhi cāti.
ne36:62.1_1: samatho ca vipassanā ca hirī ca ottappañca sati ca sampajaññañca yoniso manasikāro ca vīriyārambho ca
ne36:62.1_2: sovacassañca dhamme ñāṇañca anvaye ñāṇañca khaye ñāṇañca anuppāde ñāṇañca saddhā ca appamādo ca saddhammassavanañca
ne36:62.1_3: saṁvaro ca anabhijjhā ca abyāpādo ca rāgavirāgā ca cetovimutti avijjāvirāgā ca paññāvimutti abhisamayo
ne36:62.1_4: ca appicchatā ca santuṭṭhi ca akkodho ca anupanāho ca amakkho ca apalāso ca issāpahānañca macchariyappahānañca
ne36:62.1_5: vijjā ca vimutti ca saṅkhatārammaṇo ca vimokkho asaṅkhatārammaṇo ca vimokkho saupādisesā ca nibbānadhātu
ne36:63.1_0: Ayaṁ vuccati tipukkhalassa ca nayassa aṅkusassa ca nayassa bhūmīti.
ne36:63.2_0: Tenāha “yo akusale samūlehi netī”ti “oloketvā disalocanenā”ti ca.
